subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce’s list of adjustments for the Celtics against the Knicks in Game 2 include: fewer turnovers, more patience on offense and a bigger role for the bench and Kevin Garnett.
snippet: Paul Pierce’s list of adjustments for the Celtics against the Knicks in Game 2 include: fewer turnovers, more patience on offense and a bigger role for the bench and Kevin Garnett.
